item.title: Cycling
item.description: Bicycling is one of my favorite things about living in Germany. There are clearly marked lanes specifically for bicyclists and should you accidently wander into one you will be reminded by angry shouts and ringing bells or- simply run over. Motorists, the majority of the time, are fairly respectful of bikes at least in the city I live in. But there is one major downside when you donâ€™t have a car and that is space and weight.
